blocks.name: xpnnen
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of the set of positive integers with itself is equinumerous to the set of positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)

blocks.name: znnenlemOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete as of 6-Sep-2022. Used to be a lemma for ~ znnen . (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2004.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm znnenlemOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz))), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(co(cneg(nat2), cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1))))
} = {
  necon4bid(cv(s0), cv(s1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(co(cneg(nat2), cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), wa(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz))))
  2thd(wa(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(co(cneg(nat2), cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)))
  impcom(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  zre(cv(s0))
  zre(cv(s1))
  syld(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))
  ancomsd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wa(wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  sylbird(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wa(wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))
  anbi1d(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, nat0), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, nat0), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ltnle(cv(s1), nat0)
  mp3an2(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  ltletr(cv(s1), nat0, cv(s0))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ex(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ltne(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  adantl(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wne(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(co(cneg(nat2), cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)))
  neeqtrrd(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(co(cneg(nat2), cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cneg(cv(s1))), caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wne(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(co(nat2, cmul, cneg(cv(s1))), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cneg(cv(s1)), cz))
  znegcl(cv(s1))
  zneo(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1)))
  oveq1d(co(cneg(nat2), cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cneg(cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wceq(co(cneg(nat2), cmul, cv(s1)), co(nat2, cmul, cneg(cv(s1)))))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wceq(co(cneg(nat2), cmul, cv(s1)), co(nat2, cmul, cneg(cv(s1)))), wcel(nat2, cc), wcel(cv(s1), cc))
  2cn()
  zcn(cv(s1))
  mulneg12(nat2, cv(s1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm znnenlemOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ‚ä¢ (((0[‚â§]s0 ‚àß ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§))‚Üí(s0 = s1 ‚Üî(2[√ó]s0)=((-u(2)[√ó]s1)[+]1)))
} = {
  necon4bid(s0, s1, (2[√ó]s0), ((-u(2)[√ó]s1)[+]1), ((0[‚â§]s0 ‚àß ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)))
  2thd(((0[‚â§]s0 ‚àß ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)), s0 ‚â† s1, (2[√ó]s0)‚â†((-u(2)[√ó]s1)[+]1))
  impcom((0[‚â§]s0 ‚àß ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1), (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), s0 ‚â† s1)
  syl2an(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, ((0[‚â§]s0 ‚àß ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1)‚Üí s0 ‚â† s1), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  zre(s0)
  zre(s1)
  syld((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (0[‚â§]s0 ‚àß ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1), s0 ‚â† s1, s1[<]s0)
  ancomsd((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), 0[‚â§]s0, ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1, s1[<]s0)
  ancoms(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ((¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1 ‚àß 0[‚â§]s0)‚Üí s1[<]s0))
  sylbird((s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1 ‚àß 0[‚â§]s0), s1[<]s0, (s1[<]0 ‚àß 0[‚â§]s0))
  anbi1d((s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù), s1[<]0, 0[‚â§]s0, ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1)
  adantr(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (s1[<]0 ‚Üî ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1))
  mpan2(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (s1[<]0 ‚Üî ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ltnle(s1, nat0)
  mp3an2(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ((s1[<]0 ‚àß 0[‚â§]s0)‚Üí s1[<]s0), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  0re()
  ltletr(s1, nat0, s0)
  adantl(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (s1[<]s0 ‚Üí s0 ‚â† s1))
  ex(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s1[<]s0, s0 ‚â† s1)
  ltne(s1, s0)
  adantl((0[‚â§]s0 ‚àß ¬¨ 0[‚â§]s1), (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), (2[√ó]s0)‚â†((-u(2)[√ó]s1)[+]1))
  neeqtrrd((2[√ó]s0), ((-u(2)[√ó]s1)[+]1), ((2[√ó]-u(s1))[+]1), (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§))
  sylan2(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (2[√ó]s0)‚â†((2[√ó]-u(s1))[+]1), -u(s1)‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  znegcl(s1)
  zneo(s0, -u(s1))
  oveq1d((-u(2)[√ó]s1), caddc, nat1, (2[√ó]-u(s1)), (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§))
  adantl(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (-u(2)[√ó]s1)=(2[√ó]-u(s1)))
  sylancr(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (-u(2)[√ó]s1)=(2[√ó]-u(s1)), 2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, s1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  2cn()
  zcn(s1)
  mulneg12(nat2, s1)
}

blocks.name: znnen
blocks.content: The set of integers and the set of positive integers are equinumerous. Exercise 1 of [Gleason] p. 140. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm znnen() {
  |- wbr(cz, cen, cn)
} = {
  mp2an(wbr(cz, cen, cn), wbr(cz, cdom, cn), wbr(cn, cdom, cz))
  mp2an(wbr(cz, cdom, cn), wbr(cz, cdom, cxp(cn, cn)), wbr(cxp(cn, cn), cen, cn))
  mp2(wbr(cz, cdom, cxp(cn, cn)), wcel(cxp(cn, cn), cdm(ccrd)), wfo(cres(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cxp(cn, cn), cz))
  mp2an(wcel(cxp(cn, cn), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cn, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cn, cdm(ccrd)))
  mp2an(wcel(cn, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(com, con0), wbr(com, cen, cn))
  omelon()
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  isnumi(com, cn)
  xpnum(cn, cn)
  mpbir(wfo(cres(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cxp(cn, cn), cz), wfo(cres(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cxp(cn, cn), cima(cmin, cxp(cn, cn))))
  mp2an(wfo(cres(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cxp(cn, cn), cima(cmin, cxp(cn, cn))), wfun(cmin), wss(cxp(cn, cn), cdm(cmin)))
  ax-mp(wfun(cmin), wf(cmin, cxp(cc, cc), cc))
  ffun(cmin, cxp(cc, cc), cc)
  sseqtr4i(cxp(cn, cn), cdm(cmin), cxp(cc, cc))
  mp2an(wss(cxp(cn, cn), cxp(cc, cc)), wss(cn, cc), wss(cn, cc))
  nnsscn()
  xpss12(cn, cc, cn, cc)
  fdmi(cmin, cxp(cc, cc), cc)
  subf()
  fores(cmin, cxp(cn, cn))
  ax-mp(wb(wfo(cres(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cxp(cn, cn), cz), wfo(cres(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cxp(cn, cn), cima(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)))), wceq(cz, cima(cmin, cxp(cn, cn))))
  dfz2()
  foeq3(cz, cima(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cres(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cxp(cn, cn))
  fodomnum(cxp(cn, cn), cres(cmin, cxp(cn, cn)), cz)
  xpnnen()
  domentr(cz, cxp(cn, cn), cn)
  mp2(wbr(cn, cdom, cz), wcel(cz, universe), wss(cn, cz))
  zex()
  nnssz()
  ssdomg(cz, universe, cn)
  sbth(cz, cn)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm znnen() {
  ‚ä¢ ‚Ñ§[‚âÖ]‚Ñï
} = {
  mp2an(‚Ñ§[‚âÖ]‚Ñï, ‚Ñ§[‚âº]‚Ñï, ‚Ñï[‚âº]‚Ñ§)
  mp2an(‚Ñ§[‚âº]‚Ñï, ‚Ñ§[‚âº](‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï), (‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)[‚âÖ]‚Ñï)
  mp2(‚Ñ§[‚âº](‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï), (‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚àà dom(card), ((- |`(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)):(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚Ü† ‚Ñ§))
  mp2an((‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚àà dom(card), ‚Ñï ‚àà dom(card), ‚Ñï ‚àà dom(card))
  mp2an(‚Ñï ‚àà dom(card), _om ‚àà On, _om[‚âÖ]‚Ñï)
  omelon()
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  isnumi(com, cn)
  xpnum(cn, cn)
  mpbir(((- |`(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)):(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚Ü† ‚Ñ§), ((- |`(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)):(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚Ü†(- "(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï))))
  mp2an(((- |`(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)):(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚Ü†(- "(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï))), Fun(-), (‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚äÜ dom(-))
  ax-mp(Fun(-), (- :(‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ)‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  ffun(cmin, (‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ), cc)
  sseqtr4i((‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï), dom(-), (‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ))
  mp2an((‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚äÜ(‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ), ‚Ñï ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ, ‚Ñï ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  nnsscn()
  xpss12(cn, cc, cn, cc)
  fdmi(cmin, (‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ), cc)
  subf()
  fores(cmin, (‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï))
  ax-mp((((- |`(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)):(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚Ü† ‚Ñ§)‚Üî((- |`(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)):(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)‚Ü†(- "(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)))), ‚Ñ§ =(- "(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)))
  dfz2()
  foeq3(cz, (- "(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)), (- |`(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)), (‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï))
  fodomnum((‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï), (- |`(‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï)), cz)
  xpnnen()
  domentr(cz, (‚Ñï √ó ‚Ñï), cn)
  mp2(‚Ñï[‚âº]‚Ñ§, ‚Ñ§ ‚àà ùïå, ‚Ñï ‚äÜ ‚Ñ§)
  zex()
  nnssz()
  ssdomg(cz, universe, cn)
  sbth(cz, cn)
}

blocks.name: qnnen
blocks.content: The rational numbers are countable. This proof does not use the Axiom of Choice, even though it uses an onto function, because the base set ` ( ZZ X. NN ) ` is numerable. Exercise 2 of [Enderton] p. 133. For purposes of the Metamath 100 list, we are considering Mario Carneiro's revision as the date this proof was completed. This is Metamath 100 proof #3. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm qnnen() {
  |- wbr(cq, cen, cn)
} = {
  mp2an(wbr(cq, cen, cn), wbr(cq, cdom, cn), wbr(cn, cdom, cq))
  mp2an(wbr(cq, cdom, cn), wbr(cq, cdom, cxp(cz, cn)), wbr(cxp(cz, cn), cen, cn))
  mp2(wbr(cq, cdom, cxp(cz, cn)), wcel(cxp(cz, cn), cdm(ccrd)), wfo(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), cxp(cz, cn), cq))
  mp2an(wcel(cxp(cz, cn), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cz, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cn, cdm(ccrd)))
  mpbir(wcel(cz, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cn, cdm(ccrd)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cz, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cn, cdm(ccrd))), wbr(cz, cen, cn))
  ennum(cz, cn)
  mp2an(wcel(cn, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(com, con0), wbr(com, cen, cn))
  omelon()
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  isnumi(com, cn)
  xpnum(cz, cn)
  mpbir2an(wfo(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), cxp(cz, cn), cq), wfn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), cxp(cz, cn)), wceq(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)))), cq))
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)))
  ovex(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))
  eqtr4i(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)))), cq, cab(hs2, wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)))))))
  rnmpt2(hs2, hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))
  abbi2i(hs2, cq, wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))))
  elq(hs0, hs1, cv(hs2))
  df-fo(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), cxp(cz, cn), cq)
  fodomnum(cxp(cz, cn), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), cq)
  entri(cxp(cz, cn), cn, cxp(cn, cn))
  mp2an(wbr(cxp(cz, cn), cen, cxp(cn, cn)), wbr(cz, cen, cn), wbr(cn, cen, cn))
  znnen()
  enref(cn)
  nnex()
  xpen(cz, cn, cn, cn)
  xpnnen()
  domentr(cq, cxp(cz, cn), cn)
  mp2(wbr(cn, cdom, cq), wcel(cq, universe), wss(cn, cq))
  qex()
  nnssq()
  ssdomg(cq, universe, cn)
  sbth(cq, cn)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs2.c(cz)
  diff.hs2.c(cn)
  diff.hs2.c(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs2.c(cq)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs2))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm qnnen() {
  ‚ä¢ ‚Ñö[‚âÖ]‚Ñï
} = {
  mp2an(‚Ñö[‚âÖ]‚Ñï, ‚Ñö[‚âº]‚Ñï, ‚Ñï[‚âº]‚Ñö)
  mp2an(‚Ñö[‚âº]‚Ñï, ‚Ñö[‚âº](‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñï), (‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñï)[‚âÖ]‚Ñï)
  mp2(‚Ñö[‚âº](‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñï), (‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñï)‚àà dom(card), ((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶(hs0[√∑]hs1)):(‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñï)‚Ü† ‚Ñö))
  mp2an((‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñï)‚àà dom(card), ‚Ñ§ ‚àà dom(card), ‚Ñï ‚àà dom(card))
  mpbir(‚Ñ§ ‚àà dom(card), ‚Ñï ‚àà dom(card))
  ax-mp((‚Ñ§ ‚àà dom(card)‚Üî ‚Ñï ‚àà dom(card)), ‚Ñ§[‚âÖ]‚Ñï)
  ennum(cz, cn)
  mp2an(‚Ñï ‚àà dom(card), _om ‚àà On, _om[‚âÖ]‚Ñï)
  omelon()
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  isnumi(com, cn)
  xpnum(cz, cn)
  mpbir2an(((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶(hs0[√∑]hs1)):(‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñï)‚Ü† ‚Ñö), (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶(hs0[√∑]hs1))[Fn](‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñï), ran((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶(hs0[√∑]hs1)))= ‚Ñö)
